title.value: Data Standards Wales Patient Record Type

description.value: A set of codes used to identify the record type of a patient within the CDR

definition.value: Patient records are sourced from the Welsh Demographics Service, and this index of patient records is kept up to date via the messaging feeds sent from the service. These patient records contain an NHS number as their primary identifier but may also include PAS number identifiers.

patient records are those that are not sourced from the Welsh Demographic Service. These patient records will only contain a single PAS identifier and are synchronised with the PAS patient records via the appropriate demographic message flows from Welsh PASs.
